title: The Grandparents Want To See You. Is It Worth The Risk In A Pandemic?
description: Thinking about making a trip to visit family? In the age of the coronavirus, there are questions you need to answer before showing up at your relative's house. In this episode, we talk through best practices for if, or when, you decide to visit elderly relatives during this pandemic.
